name: Docker Compose Dev Container
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends bash curl && curl -fsSL https://github.com/docker/compose/releases/download/1.29.2/docker-compose-$(uname -s)-$(uname -m) -o /usr/local/bin/docker-compose && sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/docker-compose && sudo apt-get install -y docker.io containerd && sudo service docker start && docker-compose up --build

runServices.name: Docker
runServices.postStartMessage: Docker daemon started and authenticated to ACR.
